segments.text: Here is a gift for you . I hope you like it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What a lovely dog ! How did you know I love this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had my own ways of finding out . It's a secret . You look so beautiful today . Your new shirt goes well with your skirt .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe you don't believe it , but it was made by my grandmother .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Please have a cup of tea .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thanks . I've had enough . Now , Mary , before you blow out the birthday candles , you have to make a wish . After that , you may cut the cake .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , let me make a wish ... Do you want a big piece of cake ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , just a small one . Next let's sing ' Happy Birthday ' to Mary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is very kind of you . I'm so moved by you .
segments.speaker: S2
